mapper.select: SELECT d.`CODE`, d.TYPE, d.VALUE1, d.VALUE2, d.VALUE3, d.VALUE4, d.VALUE5, d.VALUE6, d.VALUE7, d.VALUE8, d.VALUE9, d.PCODE, d.CREATEBY, d.CREATEON, d.MODIFYBY, d.MODIFYON, d.`OWNER`, d.`STATUS`, d.TENANTID FROM dictionary AS d WHERE d.PCODE IS NULL AND( d.`STATUS` <> '1' OR d.`STATUS` IS NULL)

SELECT d.`CODE`, d.TYPE, d.VALUE1, d.VALUE2, d.VALUE3, d.VALUE4, d.VALUE5, d.VALUE6, d.VALUE7, d.VALUE8, d.VALUE9, d.PCODE, d.CREATEBY, d.CREATEON, d.MODIFYBY, d.MODIFYON, d.`OWNER`, d.`STATUS`, d.TENANTID FROM dictionary AS d WHERE d.PCODE LIKE #{code}
